snippet: At least 35 people were killed, the military said, hours after locals reported that an American drone strike in the same area killed 20 others.
abstract: Pakistani fighter jets kill at least 35 people in attacks on militant bases in remote North Waziristan tribal district that has become sanctuary for Al Qaeda and Taliban fighters.

byline.contributor: Declan Walsh contributed reporting from London.

lead_paragraph: At least 35 people were killed, the military said, hours after locals reported that an American drone strike in the same area killed 20 others.

headline.main: Pakistani Airstrikes Target Haven for Qaeda and Taliban Fighters
headline.print_headline: Pakistani Airstrikes Target Haven for Qaeda and Taliban Fighters
